name: Blitzkraft
tagline: Freelance code ninja - slicing bugs since 2014
body:
### About
I am an Industrial Engineer with a penchant for programming. I script, program, solve puzzles and write programs to solve puzzles for fun. I enjoy debugging/maintaining code. Without further ado, here's what I am good at:

#### Web dev
* Full LAMP stack development, maintenance and administration
* Ruby on Rails
* Django and Python
* PHP and MySQL
* Linux servers - Apache, lighttpd

#### Languages and scripting
* Bash
* Python
* ruby
* C/C++
* javascript/jquery
* openSCAD

#### Hardware
* Arduino
* Raspberry pi
* Beaglebone

#### Version control
* git
* CVS

#### 3D Modelling
* Inventor
* openSCAD
* Wings3D

#### Fun stuff
* Recite any xkcd quote from memory
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
